comment: если выучили язык некронов, барка на стеле, где много некронских глифов

languages.text: "Воскипает бурями в пустоте их гнев, угасают во смерти звезды во утоление их жажды, обращаются в прах противящиеся им, приходит диктат воли их. Сему мы, Йекхмет, стражей и пределом стоим".

traits.locale_text: Глубокая рябь волнами расходится на поверхности стелы, смешивая вместе ранее ровные строки. Нечто будто мешает собраться тексту воедино, но вы понимаете значение отдельных слов — "Знание", "Величие", "Неизбежное".

languages.text: "Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."
languages.original_text: "Воскипает бурями в пустоте их гнев, угасают во смерти звезды во утоление их жажды, обращаются в прах противящиеся им, приходит диктат воли их. Сему мы, Йекхмет, стражей и пределом стоим".

traits.locale_text: "Their anger boils up in storms in the void, the stars fade away in death to quench their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

"Their anger boils up in storms in the void, the stars fade away in death to quench their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

"Their anger boils up in maelströms in the void, the stars fade away and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

"Their anger boils up in maelströms in the void, the stars fade away and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

"Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

"Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

languages.text: «Su ira hierve en torbellinos en el vacío. Las estrellas se extinguen y mueren para saciar su sed. Quienes se resisten a ellos se convierten en polvo y el dictado de su voluntad es inevitable. Por eso nosotros, los Yekhmet, montamos guardia como su frontera».
languages.original_text: "Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

traits.locale_text: «Su ira hierve en torbellinos en el vacío. Las estrellas se extinguen y mueren para saciar su sed. Quienes se resisten a ellos se convierten en polvo y el dictado de su voluntad es inevitable. Por eso nosotros, los Yekhmet, montamos guardia como su frontera».

languages.text: « Leur colère bouillonne dans des maelströms du néant, les étoiles s'éteignent et meurent pour étancher leur soif, ceux qui leur résistent tombent en poussière et leur volonté fait loi. Aussi les Yekhmets montent-ils la garde à la limite. »
languages.original_text: "Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

traits.locale_text: « Leur colère bouillonne dans des maelströms du néant, les étoiles s'éteignent et meurent pour étancher leur soif, ceux qui leur résistent tombent en poussière et leur volonté fait loi. Aussi les Yekhmets montent-ils la garde à la limite. »

languages.text: 「彼らの怒りはヴォイドの渦の中で煮えたぎり、その渇きを癒すために星々は消えて死に絶え、歯向かう者は塵と変わり、彼らの意志の命令が下る。それゆえに我らイェクメトは、境界を守護しているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの怒りはヴォイドの渦の中で煮えたぎり、その渇きを癒すために星々は消えて死に絶え、歯向かう者は塵と変わり、彼らの意志の命令が下る。それゆえに我らイェクメトは、境界を守護しているのだ」

languages.text: “他们的愤怒在虚空的漩涡之中沸腾，群星在他们得饥渴之中消逝。胆敢单抗他们的人将会化为尘土，他们得旨意必将降临。因此，我们叶赫迈特，将会始终恪守职责。”
languages.original_text: "Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

traits.locale_text: “他们的愤怒在虚空的漩涡之中沸腾，群星在他们得饥渴之中消逝。胆敢单抗他们的人将会化为尘土，他们得旨意必将降临。因此，我们叶赫迈特，将会始终恪守职责。”

languages.text: "Ihr Zorn kocht in Mahlströmen in der Leere auf, die Sterne verblassen und sterben, um ihren Durst zu stillen, wer sich wehrt, der wird zu Staub, das Diktat ihres Willens kommt. Daher stehen wir, Yekhmet, Wache als die Grenze."
languages.original_text: "Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Zorn kocht in Mahlströmen in der Leere auf, die Sterne verblassen und sterben, um ihren Durst zu stillen, wer sich wehrt, der wird zu Staub, das Diktat ihres Willens kommt. Daher stehen wir, Yekhmet, Wache als die Grenze."

languages.text: "Öfkeleri uçsuzdaki fırtınalarda birikiyor, susuzluklarını dindirmek adına yıldızlar soluyor ve ölüyor, onlara direnenler toza dönüşüyor, iradelerinin hükmü yaklaşıyor. Bu yüzden de biz Yekhmetler, muhafızlık görevindeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Their anger boils up in maelstroms in the void, the stars fade and die in the name of quenching their thirst, those who resist them turn to dust, the dictate of their will comes. Therefore we, Yekhmet, stand guard as the limit."
